title: Mechanic.Escape-HI2U
description:
Developer : Slak Games 
 Publisher : Tekneo, Plug In Digital	
 Genre : Adventure / Action
Screenshots : LINK

 Resume : In a world oppressed by ruthless machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Your lost friends and the lack of resources drive you to take action against the extinction. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

 Minimum requirements : 
OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7 
Processor: 1.4GHz Processor 
Memory: 1 GB RAM 
Graphics: Any graphic card since 2004 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space

 Installation
1. Mount with Daemon Tools or burn iso. 
2. Install the game.
3. Copy crack from "crack" directory and paste in game directoty!
4. Play!

Have FUN! 
Please seed & enjoy!
